name: Stormy Knight
description:
For the last time, the adventurer has foiled your plans for world domination. Hold the tower and delay the rescue of the princess for as long as you can against the meddling knight. Credits:

Designed by:

  • Michael Feldman
  • Gabriella Rincón

Freesound.org sounds:

  • Rain
  • Thunder
  • Branch Break
  • Tree thud
  • Wood chop
  • Rock crumble
